questions.question: Which of the following can be represented for decoder?

explanations.b: A decoder is a combinational circuit as its outputs depend only on the current inputs, not on past states.

explanations.c: A decoder takes N binary inputs and activates one of 2^N unique output lines based on the input combination.

questions.question: Which types of stuck at fault model exhibits the reduced complexity level of test generation?

explanations.a: Although more complex in nature, multiple stuck-at fault models can reduce overall test generation complexity by detecting multiple faults simultaneously, improving test efficiency in some cases.

questions.question: Which of the following is the application of decoder ?

answers.a: Converts analog audio to digital form
answers.b: Converts computer instructions to CPU control signal.

explanations.b: A decoder is used in CPUs to translate binary instruction codes into specific control signals for execution.

questions.question: A 4 x 16 decoder can be constructed (with enable input) by :

answers.a: With five 2 x 4 decoders(each with enable inputs) only
answers.b: Using two 3 x 8 decoder(each with enable) only

explanations.a: A 4x16 decoder can be built hierarchically using one 2x4 decoder to select among four 2x4 decoders, totaling five, with enable inputs used to control output activation.
